title: Smart Education Loan
shortDesc: Flexible microloan for tuition and exam fees.
description: This loan is specially designed for students who need financial support for tuition fees, exam registration, semester fees, and academic materials. It helps reduce the burden on families by providing flexible EMI options, fast approval, and minimal documentation. Students can focus on their studies without worrying about financial stress, ensuring uninterrupted education.

title: Starter Business Loan
description: This loan is for new and small business owners looking to expand their shop or start a new venture. From purchasing stock to upgrading equipment, this microloan helps small entrepreneurs grow steadily. The loan offers simple documentation, moderate interest rates, fast disbursement, and easy EMI plans to support business development.

title: Smart Medical Loan
description: Medical emergencies often require immediate financial support. This loan ensures quick access to funds for hospital bills, diagnosis, medicines, and urgent treatments. With minimal paperwork, fast approval, and short EMI plans, families can focus on recovery instead of financial pressure.

title: Home Appliance Loan
shortDesc: Loan for fridge, TV, washing machine.
description: This loan helps families purchase essential home appliances such as refrigerators, televisions, washing machines, fans, and kitchen items. Customers can enjoy easy EMI plans and low processing charges. It is ideal for households needing immediate upgrades but lacking upfront cash.

title: Mobile Upgrade Loan
shortDesc: Buy your new smartphone with EMI.
description: Designed for students, freelancers, and professionals who want to buy a new smartphone but cannot pay the full amount upfront. This loan covers mid-range to flagship devices. With small EMIs and quick approval, users can easily upgrade their devices without financial stress.

title: Smart Travel Loan
shortDesc: Loan for travel, vacation, or Umrah.
description: This loan helps individuals and families travel without worrying about immediate expenses. It covers vacation trips, Umrah packages, and domestic or international travel costs. With flexible repayment and fair interest rates, anyone can plan memorable travel experiences.

title: Marriage Support Loan
shortDesc: Loan for wedding and event costs.
description: Weddings are expensive, and this loan is designed to reduce financial pressure on families. It covers hall rent, decoration, photography, food arrangements, and other event costs. With longer EMI durations and easy approval, families can manage wedding expenses smoothly.

title: Emergency Funds Loan
description: This loan provides instant financial help for sudden emergencies such as house repairs, urgent bills, or unexpected expenses. With a fast approval process and short-term EMI plans, customers can manage emergencies without stress or delays.

title: Agriculture Micro Loan
shortDesc: Support for seeds, fertilizer, and small equipment.
description: This loan is specially made for farmers who need help purchasing seeds, fertilizers, pesticides, and small agricultural tools. The goal is to support higher crop production. With reasonable interest rates and seasonal EMI plans, farmers can repay comfortably after harvest.

title: Smart Salary Loan
description: This loan helps salaried individuals manage tight months, unexpected expenses, or urgent cash shortages before payday. With small EMIs and reasonable interest rates, it provides short-term financial stability without extra burden.
